Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Creates empty Intent instance with no action, data, or component specified

return_values.description: constructor returns new Intent object instance

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Creates Intent with specified action string, commonly used for system actions like VIEW or SEND

return_values.description: constructor returns new Intent object with action set

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Creates Intent with action and data URI, used for actions that operate on specific data

return_values.description: constructor returns new Intent object with action and data URI

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Creates explicit Intent targeting specific component class within given context

return_values.description: constructor returns new Intent targeting specified component

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Creates copy of existing Intent, preserving all properties including action, data, extras, and flags

return_values.description: constructor returns new Intent object copied from source

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Checks whether Intent contains specified extra parameter key, used for validating required data presence

return_values.description: true if parameter key exists in Intent extras, false if key not found

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Retrieves string value associated with specified parameter key from Intent extras bundle

return_values.description: string value if key exists, null if key not found or value not string type

Intent Operations.purpose_behavior: Retrieves integer value for specified key from Intent extras, returning default if key missing

return_values.description: double value if key exists, default value if key not found

return_values.description: byte value if key exists, default value if key not found

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when activity is first created, used for one-time initialization and UI setup

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when activity becomes visible to user, used for starting animations or background processes

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when activity gains user focus and becomes interactive

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when activity loses focus but remains partially visible, used for pausing operations

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when activity is no longer visible to user, used for stopping expensive operations

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called before activity is destroyed, used for final cleanup and resource release

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when stopped activity is restarted, followed by onStart and onResume

return_values.description: no return value, lifecycle callback method

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called to save activity state before potential destruction, preserves UI state

return_values.description: no return value, saves state to provided Bundle

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called to restore previously saved activity state after recreation

return_values.description: no return value, restores state from provided Bundle

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when launched activity returns result data to calling activity

return_values.description: no return value, processes result data from launched activity

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when user responds to runtime permission request dialog

return_values.description: no return value, processes permission grant or denial results

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when activity receives new Intent while already running with singleTop or singleTask launch mode

return_values.description: no return value, processes new Intent data

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when device configuration changes such as screen rotation or language change

return_values.description: no return value, handles configuration change

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when system is running low on memory, should release non-essential resources

return_values.description: no return value, memory management callback

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Called when system requests memory trimming at specified level, used for memory optimization

return_values.description: no return value, trim level indicates urgency

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Terminates current activity and removes it from activity stack, returning to previous activity

return_values.description: no return value, initiates activity termination

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Finishes current activity and all activities below it in task with same affinity

return_values.description: no return value, terminates related activities

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Finishes activity and removes entire task from recents list

return_values.description: no return value, removes task from system

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Launches new activity using provided Intent, standard activity launching method

return_values.description: no return value, initiates activity launch

Activity Lifecycle.purpose_behavior: Launches activity expecting result data, using request code to identify response

return_values.description: no return value, initiates activity launch with result expectation

return_values.description: no return value, sets result code and data for caller
